titleStmt.title: [3 dialogues in verse, between Gelasimus and Spudaeus, Eda and Agna, and Wisdom and Wyll]
titleStmt.author: Fisher, John, student in Oxford.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Smithfyeld at the signe of the mytre, by Ihon Tisdale for William Pickeryng dwellyng at saynt Magnus corner,
publicationStmt.date: In the yeare of our Lord God M. D. L. VIII. The .v. daye of Marche [1558]

notesStmt.note: At end of G1 verso: Compiled by Ihon Fysher student in Oxforde.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
